menu_items.name: The Neighborhood's Gangster Pizza
menu_items.description: Dive into our classic gangsta' pizza topped with sliced tomato, burrata cheese, Parmesan cheese, basil and pesto sauce that rules the neighborhood.

menu_items.name: Police & Thieves Pizza
menu_items.description: Feeling like gettin' some veggies while you devour your pizza? Look no further. Our fresh mushroom and spinach pizza is here for you!

menu_items.name: The Slaughter of the Meat Pizza
menu_items.description: Devour our delicious combination of all halal meat spread out on a cheese pizza with tomato sauce and special seasoning.

menu_items.name: Mama's and Papa's Pizza
menu_items.description: Enjoy a white cheese pizza topped with delicious crispy chicken, sliced tomato, onion and Thousand Island sauce.

menu_items.name: Chicken Florentine Pizza
menu_items.description: This pie has fresh sauteed pieces of chicken topping a delicious white cheese pizza. After you add some fresh scallions, Italian herbs and ranch, you're ready to go! Bite in, and thank us later ;).

menu_items.name: The 2 Horsemen Pizza
menu_items.description: A mouthwatering pepperoni sausage pizza. Pieces of perfectly golden halal sausage and halal pepperoni sprinkled on top of a cheese-loaded pizza.

menu_items.name: The Classic Queen Pizza
menu_items.description: Margherita. Dive into our classic 14" Margherita pie. Take a bite of our queen topped with homemade tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, Parmesan cheese, basil and organic olive oil.

menu_items.name: The Halal Buffalo Revolution Pizza
menu_items.description: Our homemade pizza made with buffalo chicken pieces spread out across a white cheese pie and ranch on top. Not for the faint of heart.

menu_items.name: The Halal BBQ Delights Pizza
menu_items.description: The Texan smokehouses would be proud of this one. BBQ chicken spread across a white cheese pie and smothered with our house secret BBQ sauce. Bite in!

menu_items.name: The Halal Pepperoni Feast Pizza
menu_items.description: This pizza is for pepperoni lovers. We took your pepperoni situation to another level. This is halal pepperoni and you can conquer it.
